channel.title: Help with my client please?
channel.description:
This sounds kinda leechy, but before i want to do any work on my client i want to change the name of it, i've changed everything i can find in client.java, but i believe the rest of it is in gui.java, which i cant find?? Also i've looked at another client, and it has custom stuff in it, how can i add my own custom interfaces? Thanks guys if you help :D
[b]EDIT:[/b] Never mind about that, i've done it but how do i change the IP of the client to localhost?

item.title: Help with my client please?
item.dc:creator: @tman915 tman915
item.description:
@tman915 wrote:

pretty sure you go into your client and then “gui.java” if you found it.
then search either server ip, no-ip or just ip.
then change whatever is there to 127.1.1 or localhost

should work

Read full topic
